Square - Class in org.projectsw.Model.CommonGoal
The Square class represents a game strategy where the goal is to have at least 2 separate 2x2 squares on the shelf that contain tiles of the same type.

startGame() - Method in class org.projectsw.Controller.Engine
Starts the game by changing the game state to "RUNNING", saving the game status, filling the board, notifying players of name colors, notifying the next player's turn, and notifying the nickname of the last player.
